mapper.select: SELECT DISP.CO_CD, DISP.PRD_CLCD, SSP_APP.FN_PR_FULL_CLSF_NM(DISP.CO_CD, DISP.PRD_CLCD) PRD_CLSF_NM, TO_NUMBER(DISP.REPR_PRD_ID) REPR_PRD_ID, DISP.DISP_PRD_NM, DISP.USE_YN, DISP.DISP_PRD_SPR_CD, DISP.ADD_INFO_SET_YN, DISP.PRFRT, DISP.UPD_RSN, DISP.SRT_SO, DISP.REGPSN_ID, DISP.REG_DTM, DISP.UPDPSN_ID, DISP.UPD_DTM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_BASIS DISP, SSP_APP.TB_PR_PRD_CLSF_INFO CLSF WHERE DISP.CO_CD = CLSF.CO_CD AND DISP.PRD_CLCD = CLSF.PRD_CLCD AND DISP.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND DISP.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD}

SELECT PRD.CO_CD , TO_NUMBER(PRD.PRD_ID) PRD_ID_VIEW, PRD.PRD_ID, PRD.PRD_NM, PRD.PRD_CLCD , SSP_APP.FN_PR_FULL_CLSF_NM(PRD.CO_CD, PRD.PRD_CLCD) PRD_CLSF_NM, SSP_APP.FN_PR_ATTR_VAL_LIST(PRD.CO_CD, PRD.PRD_ID) ATTR_VAL, MNFR.MNFR_NM , CTRY.CTRY_NM, CASE WHEN BASIS_UNIT_CD = NVL(SELL_UNIT_CD, BASIS_UNIT_CD) THEN NVL(BASIS_UNIT_QTY, '1') || BASIS_UNIT_CD ELSE NVL(SELL_UNIT_QTY, '1') || SELL_UNIT_CD || '(' || NVL(BASIS_UNIT_QTY, '1') || BASIS_UNIT_CD || ')' END AS SELL_UNIT_CD , SSP_APP.FN_COM_DTL_CDNM('KO', 'USE_YN', PRD.PRD_USE_YN) PRD_USE_YN FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_PRD_INFO PRD INNER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_PR_MRO_PRD_INFO MPRD ON MPRD.CO_CD = PRD.CO_CD AND MPRD.PRD_ID = PRD.PRD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_PR_MNFR_INFO MNFR ON MNFR.CO_CD = PRD.CO_CD AND MNFR.MNFR_NO = MPRD.MNFR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_CO_CTRY_INFO CTRY ON CTRY.CO_CD = PRD.CO_CD AND CTRY.CTRY_SPR_CD = MPRD.ORGPLC_CTRY_CD WHERE PRD.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD.PRD_ID = LPAD(#{PRD_ID}, 18, '0')

SELECT CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, OPTN_ITM_NO, OPTN_NM, MAND_YN, IPT_TYPE_CD, SRT_SO, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM, UPDPSN_ID, UPD_DTM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} ORDER BY SRT_SO, OPTN_ITM_NO

SELECT D.CO_CD, D.PRD_CLCD, (SELECT OPTN_NM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS S WHERE S.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND S.PRD_CLCD = D.PRD_CLCD AND S.OPTN_ITM_NO = D.OPTN_ITM_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) OPTN_NM, COUNT(D.OPTN_ITM_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY D.OPTN_ITM_NO) OPTN_CNT, D.OPTN_ITM_NO, D.OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO, D.OPTN_DTL_NM, D.SRT_SO, D.OPTN_DTL_CTS, D.DOC_REG_ID, D.DOC_REG_ID ASIS_DOC_REG_ID, (SELECT ATFL_NM FROM SSP_APP.TB_CO_ATFL_DTLS S WHERE S.DOC_REG_ID = D.DOC_REG_ID AND S.DOC_REG_SEQ = 1) ATFL_NM, D.REGPSN_ID, D.REG_DTM, D.UPDPSN_ID, D.UPD_DTM, B.IPT_TYPE_CD FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS B INNER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL D ON B.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND B.PRD_CLCD = D.PRD_CLCD AND B.OPTN_ITM_NO = D.OPTN_ITM_NO WHERE B.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND B.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} ORDER BY B.SRT_SO, B.OPTN_ITM_NO, D.SRT_SO, D.OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO

SELECT D.CO_CD, D.PRD_CLCD, D.OPTN_DTL_MAPP_ITM_NO, D.OPTN_DTL_ITM_MAPP_CTS, TO_NUMBER(MAPP_PRD_ID) MAPP_PRD_ID, S.PRD_NM, S.PRD_USE_YN, SSP_APP.FN_PR_ATTR_VAL_LIST(D.CO_CD, LPAD(D.MAPP_PRD_ID, 18, '0')) ATTR_VAL, D.REGPSN_ID, D.REG_DTM, D.UPDPSN_ID, D.UPD_DTM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL_MAPP D LEFT OUTER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_PR_PRD_INFO S ON D.CO_CD = S.CO_CD AND LPAD(D.MAPP_PRD_ID, 18, '0') = S.PRD_ID WHERE D.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND D.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} ORDER BY OPTN_DTL_MAPP_ITM_NO

SELECT B.OPTN_ITM_NO, B.OPTN_NM, D.OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO, D.OPTN_DTL_NM FROM TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS B, TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL D WHERE B.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND B.PRD_CLCD = D.PRD_CLCD AND B.OPTN_ITM_NO = D.OPTN_ITM_NO AND B.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND B.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO = #{OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO, ADD_OPTN_NM, IPT_TYPE_CD, MAND_YN, ATFL_YN, SRT_SO, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM, UPDPSN_ID, UPD_DTM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_BASIS WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} ORDER BY SRT_SO, ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO

SELECT D.CO_CD, D.PRD_CLCD, (SELECT ADD_OPTN_NM FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_BASIS S WHERE S.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND S.PRD_CLCD = D.PRD_CLCD AND S.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO = D.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) ADD_OPTN_NM, COUNT(D.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY D.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO) ADD_OPTN_CNT, D.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO, D.ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO, D.ADD_OPTN_DTL_NM, D.SRT_SO, D.OPTN_DTL_CTS, D.DOC_REG_ID, D.REGPSN_ID, D.REG_DTM, D.UPDPSN_ID, D.UPD_DTM, B.IPT_TYPE_CD, B.ATFL_YN FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_BASIS B INNER JOIN SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_DTL D ON B.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND B.PRD_CLCD = D.PRD_CLCD AND B.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO = D.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO WHERE D.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND D.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} ORDER BY B.SRT_SO, B.ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO, D.SRT_SO, D.ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_BASIS USING DUAL ON (CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET REPR_PRD_ID = LPAD(#{REPR_PRD_ID}, 18, '0'), DISP_PRD_NM = #{DISP_PRD_NM}, USE_YN = #{USE_YN}, DISP_PRD_SPR_CD = #{DISP_PRD_SPR_CD}, ADD_INFO_SET_YN = #{ADD_INFO_SET_YN}, PRFRT = #{PRFRT}, UPD_RSN = #{UPD_RSN}, SRT_SO = #{SRT_SO}, UPDPSN_ID = #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, UPD_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, REPR_PRD_ID, DISP_PRD_NM, USE_YN, DISP_PRD_SPR_CD, ADD_INFO_SET_YN, PRFRT, UPD_RSN, SRT_SO, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, LPAD(#{REPR_PRD_ID}, 18, '0'), #{DISP_PRD_NM}, #{USE_YN}, #{DISP_PRD_SPR_CD}, #{ADD_INFO_SET_YN}, #{PRFRT}, #{UPD_RSN}, #{SRT_SO}, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)

MERGE INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS USING DUAL ON (CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_ITM_NO = #{OPTN_ITM_NO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OPTN_NM = #{OPTN_NM}, MAND_YN = #{MAND_YN}, IPT_TYPE_CD = #{IPT_TYPE_CD}, SRT_SO = #{SRT_SO}, UPDPSN_ID = #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, UPD_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, OPTN_ITM_NO, OPTN_NM, MAND_YN, IPT_TYPE_CD, SRT_SO, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, #{OPTN_ITM_NO}, #{OPTN_NM}, #{MAND_YN}, #{IPT_TYPE_CD}, #{SRT_SO}, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)

MERGE INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL USING DUAL ON (CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_ITM_NO = #{OPTN_ITM_NO} AND OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO = #{OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OPTN_DTL_NM = #{OPTN_DTL_NM}, SRT_SO = #{SRT_SO}, OPTN_DTL_CTS = #{OPTN_DTL_CTS}, DOC_REG_ID = #{DOC_REG_ID}, UPDPSN_ID = #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, UPD_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, OPTN_ITM_NO, OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO, OPTN_DTL_NM, SRT_SO, OPTN_DTL_CTS, DOC_REG_ID, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, #{OPTN_ITM_NO}, #{OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}, #{OPTN_DTL_NM}, #{SRT_SO}, #{OPTN_DTL_CTS}, #{DOC_REG_ID}, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL_MAPP (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, OPTN_DTL_MAPP_ITM_NO, OPTN_DTL_ITM_MAPP_CTS, MAPP_PRD_ID, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM, UPDPSN_ID, UPD_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, #{OPTN_DTL_MAPP_ITM_NO}, #{OPTN_DTL_ITM_MAPP_CTS}, LPAD(#{MAPP_PRD_ID}, 18, '0'), #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)

MERGE INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_BASIS USING DUAL ON (CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} AND ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO = #{ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ADD_OPTN_NM = #{ADD_OPTN_NM}, IPT_TYPE_CD = #{IPT_TYPE_CD}, MAND_YN = #{MAND_YN}, ATFL_YN = #{ATFL_YN}, SRT_SO = #{SRT_SO}, UPDPSN_ID = #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, UPD_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO, ADD_OPTN_NM, IPT_TYPE_CD, MAND_YN, ATFL_YN, SRT_SO, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, #{ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO}, #{ADD_OPTN_NM}, #{IPT_TYPE_CD}, #{MAND_YN}, #{ATFL_YN}, #{SRT_SO}, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)

MERGE INTO SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_DTL USING DUAL ON (CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD} AND ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO = #{ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO} AND ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO = #{ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ADD_OPTN_DTL_NM = #{ADD_OPTN_DTL_NM}, SRT_SO = #{SRT_SO}, OPTN_DTL_CTS = #{OPTN_DTL_CTS}, UPDPSN_ID = #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, UPD_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CO_CD, PRD_CLCD, ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO, ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO, ADD_OPTN_DTL_NM, SRT_SO, OPTN_DTL_CTS, REGPSN_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES(#{CO_CD}, #{PRD_CLCD}, #{ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO}, #{ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}, #{ADD_OPTN_DTL_NM}, #{SRT_SO}, #{OPTN_DTL_CTS}, #{SESSION_OPRTR_ID}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_BASIS WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD}

SELECT OP.CO_CD, OP.OPRTR_ID, OP.OPRTR_NM, CLSF.PRD_CLCD, CLSF.PRD_CLSF_NM FROM SSP_APP.TB_CO_MBR_OPRTR_INFO OP, SSP_APP.TB_PR_PRD_CLSF_CHRPSN_INFO PS, TB_PR_PRD_CLSF_INFO CLSF WHERE OP.CO_CD = PS.CO_CD AND OP.OPRTR_ID = PS.PRD_CLSF_CHRPSN_ID AND PS.PRD_CLSF_CHRPSN_SPR_CD = '10' AND PS.PRD_CLSF_CHRPSN_TP_CD = '20' AND PS.PRD_CLSF_CHRPSN_USEYN = 'Y' AND PS.MNFR_NO = '*' AND PS.CO_CD = CLSF.CO_CD AND PS.PRD_CLCD = CLSF.PRD_CLCD AND PS.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND PS.PRD_CLCD = #{PRD_CLCD}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_BASIS WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO} AND OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_OPTN_DTL_MAPP WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_BASIS WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_DTL WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO}
DELETE FROM SSP_APP.TB_PR_DISP_ADD_OPTN_DTL WHERE CO_CD=#{CO_CD} AND PRD_CLCD=#{PRD_CLCD} AND ADD_OPTN_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_ITM_NO} AND ADD_OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO=#{OPTN_DTL_ITM_NO}
